pages.text: You had more than enough time to develop your own individual fighting style.$(br)To best support this style, you've designed a range of matching gear out of interesting materials.$(br2)Disadvantage: The shards used in the production are kind of brittle. Therefore, this equipment has a comparatively low durability.

To take advantage of their unique abilities you will need some special materials.$(br2)$(bold)Helmet:$() When nothingness meets hell$(br2)$(bold)Chestplate:$() The golden Ratio$(br2)$(bold)Leggings:$() The source of nightmares$(br2)$(bold)Boots:$() Mourning of the Nether$(br2)They can be repaired in Anvils by using $(l:general/gemstone_shards)Gemstone Shards$().
Gives attackers Weakness and Slowness when they hit you, letting you slip through their claws like a shadow.
Grants Absorption and Instant Health when you get hit, making you a formidable close combat fighter.
Gives a short burst of Speed and Invisibility when you get hit, giving you an opportunity to retreat. Perfect for ranged combat.
Gives you a short burst of Resistance and Regeneration on hit, making you a massive wall for a short duration.
